00101 typedef struct {
00102     int len;
00103     int id;
00104     int responseTo;
00105     int op;
00106 } mongo_header;

00108 typedef struct {
00109     mongo_header head;
00110     char data;
00111 } mongo_message;

00113 typedef struct {
00114     int flag; /* FIX THIS COMMENT non-zero on failure */
00115     int64_t cursorID;
00116     int start;
00117     int num;
00118 } mongo_reply_fields;

00120 typedef struct {
00121     mongo_header head;
00122     mongo_reply_fields fields;
00123     char objs;
00124 } mongo_reply;

00127 typedef struct mongo_host_port {
00128     char host[255];
00129     int port;
00130     struct mongo_host_port *next;
00131 } mongo_host_port;
00132 
00133 typedef struct {
00134     mongo_host_port *seeds;        
00135     mongo_host_port *hosts;        
00136     char *name;                    
00137     bson_bool_t primary_connected; 
00138 } mongo_replset;

00140 typedef struct mongo {
00141     mongo_host_port *primary;  
00142     mongo_replset *replset;    
00143     int sock;                  
00144     int flags;                 
00145     int conn_timeout_ms;       
00146     int op_timeout_ms;         
00147     bson_bool_t connected;     
00149     mongo_error_t err;         
00150     char errstr[128];          
00151     int lasterrcode;           
00152     char *lasterrstr;          
00153 } mongo;

00155 typedef struct {
00156     mongo_reply *reply;  
00157     mongo *conn;       
00158     const char *ns;    
00159     int flags;
